name: Dry Goods Non-Alcoholic Beer Sparkling Lemonade Sour
description: When life gives you lemons... make it a Dry Goods Lemonade Sour. Bright, zesty, and bold with all of the flavour, none of the alcohol. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in British Columbia.

name: Field House Brewing Co. Non-Alcoholic Hazy Juicy IPA
description: Meet the non-alc version of their classic Field House Hazy IPA. Their Non-Alc Hazy IPA is here to bring the party minus the buzz. Big hops, tropical flavour, <0.5% ABV. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Abbotsford, BC

name: Helix - Bière Sans Gluten-Free - Alcohol Free - Blonde Ale
description: This gluten-free product has been carefully brewed to create a light and refreshing beer made from rice, millet, and corn. Our unique brewing process results in a non-alcoholic beverage that is light and easy to drink, with subtle cereal notes and a pleasant smoothness on the palate. ABV: <0.5% Crafted in Quebec

name: One For The Road Brewing GEDfest 2025 Motor Inn Non-Alcoholic Golden A
description: GEDfest's mission is to honour Gord Downie's life and the music of The Tragically Hip, while also giving back to the community through the power of live music and charity. Proceeds of the GEDFest Golden Ale goes to support Cancer foundations across Canada. This award-winning ale-lager hybrid is light and refreshing. It's the perfect complement to any outdoor activity and has quickly become a cult favourite. ABV: 0.5% IBU: 25 Crafted in Calgary, AB

name: One For The Road Brewing Pedal Power Non-Alcoholic Peach Wheat Ale
description: Brewed with a clean, dry base and subtle peach character, Pedal Power Peach balances bright fruit aroma with a crisp finish designed to drink easy without overwhelming sweetness. ABV: 0.5% IBU: 30 Crafted in Calgary, AB

name: Dry Goods Non-Alcoholic Beer Grapefruit IPA Non-Alcoholic
description: Discover the refreshing zest of this non-alcoholic Grapefruit IPA. Packed with abundant grapefruit aroma and a tangy taste, this brew offers a citrusy twist on the traditional IPA. Vibrant and punchy. A fruit driven IPA that still drinks like a craft beer. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in British Columbia.

name: Dry Goods Non-Alcoholic Beer West Cost IPA Non-Alcoholic
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant flavours of the West Coast with this Non-Alcoholic West Coast IPA. With an intense hop aroma and flavour that shines brightly, this brew offers a refreshing take on a classic style. Bright, hoppy, and unapologetically West Coast. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in British Columbia.

name: Tool Shed Brewing Company Zero Golden Hour Non-Alcoholic Hazy Pale Ale
description: Zero Golden Hour is all the glow, none of the buzz. Same golden haze, same tropical vibes - peach, mango, pineapple - now just at 0.5%. Whether you're on the clock, on the trails, or just taking it easy, this brew brings the good times without the alcohol. Because Golden Hour isn't about what's in your glass it's about what's around you. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Calgary, AB

name: Alley Kat Brewing Unhammered Non-Alcoholic Crisp Brew
description: More information coming soon! ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Edmonton, AB

name: Chilly Ones Beer Crushable Lager Non-Alcoholic
description: This De-Alc Lager offers a refreshing, crisp, and clean taste without the alcohol, perfect for any social setting. Fully fermented and matured, it delivers an authentic beer experience with only 80 calories and 3g of protein per can. Designed by professional athletes, this sleek and approachable brew is crafted for moments that matter, blending health, style, and exceptional flavour. Enjoy the true essence of beer without compromise, making every sip a celebration of connection and ease. ABV: 0.3% Crafted in Calgary, AB

name: Side Launch Brewing Co. Lager Non-Alcoholic
description: From the brewers at Side Launch comes a non-alcoholic lager that doesn’t compromise on flavour. Brewed with the same care and tradition as their full-strength beers, this 0.45% ABV lager is clean, crisp, and wonderfully easy-drinking. Golden in the glass with a balanced malt backbone and a refreshing finish, it’s the kind of beer you can reach for any time—whether you’re winding down after a long day or keeping things light at a weekend gathering. Made with quality barley and wheat, it delivers a full beer experience without the buzz. ABV: 0.45% Crafted in Collingwood, ON

name: Sober Carpenter Experimental Brew #2 Blueberry Wit Non-Alcoholic
description: Crafted with blueberries picked at the peak of the season, this limited-edition wheat beer bursts with juicy, refreshing flavour. Each sip balances natural sweetness and gentle tartness on a smooth wheat body—light, crisp, and perfect for any occasion. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Montreal, QC

name: Sober Carpenter Experimental Brew #1 Orange Radler Non-Alcoholic
description: Sober Carpenter just cracked open the vault. The first drop in their brand-new Experimental Brews series, this Citrus Radler is a sharp, small-batch remix of the classic summer crusher. Real citrus leads the charge—orange, pink grapefruit, and blood orange—blended to hit that perfect sweet-spot between tart, juicy, and ridiculously refreshing. Crafted for curious drinkers and warm-weather rebels, this one’s here for a good time, not a long time. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Montreal, QC

name: Field House Brewing Co. Non-Alcoholic Salted Lime Mexican Lager
description: This extra light version of their beloved Salted Lime Mexican Lager is made even more crushable with the absence of alcohol. All the same quality ingredients without any of the buzz. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Abbotsford, BC

name: Templ Brewing Golden Lager Non-Alcoholic
description: This non-alcoholic lager pays homage to the time-honoured classics. Refreshing, familiar, dependable — like your favourite beer should be. Refreshingly crisp with a hint of sweetness, balanced by notes of honey and a touch of citrus zest. ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Cochrane, AB

name: Burdock Brewery Swoon Non-Alc Stout
description: Introducing Swoon, our brand new non-alc stout. Made with oats and roasted barley, we're proud of this toasty contribution to the non-alc world. Chocolate, dark roast coffee and toffee. We hope you love it! ABV: -0.5% Crafted in Burlington, ON

name: Burdock Brewery Swishh Non-Alcoholic IPA
description: At a straight-shooting 0.5% abv, Swishh has the flavour, foam, and feel of a Burdock IPA without the buzz. Hoppy, juicy, and medium-bodied with a slightly bitter finish. ABV: -0.5% Crafted in Burlington, ON

name: Blood Brothers Brewing Paradise Lost - Non-Alcoholic Spiced Cherry Sou
description: They brewed the perfect non-alc sour ale and fermented it on copious amounts of cherry. They then aged the resulting beer on a blend of spices to create flavours reminiscent of homemade cherry pie and mulled wine. This Paradise Lost Spiced Cherry pairs well with après ski, fire pits, crisp air and good company. See you on the mountain! ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Toronto, ON

name: Bow River Brewing Knobby Tire Non-Alcoholic Brown Ale
description: The beer created for all your knobby tire adventures – mountain biking, dirt biking, racing……….. You want to be at your best and enjoy a great tasting beer! This is our second beer in the No-Limits series. You decide your adventure and enjoy great tasting beer – No Limits! ABV: 0.5% Crafted in Calgary, AB

name: Deschutes Brewery Fresh Squeezed IPA Non-Alcoholic
description: An Alternative To The Original Main Squeeze: A refreshingly familiar and balanced IPA with notes of bright citrus and tropical fruit. So close to the original, you'll have to double check the can! Their non-alcoholic brewing process helps preserve the bright, juicy aromas and flavors of orange and passionfruit that you enjoy with the "OG" Fresh Squeezed. ABV: 0.5% IBU: 45 Crafted in Bend, OR
